HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: kurýrní službou DPD 99 Kč, Česká pošta/balík Do ruky 99 Kč

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Česká pošta/balík Na poštu 89 Kč, Balíkovna 59 Kč, Zásilkovna 59 Kč

IN_STORE_PICKUP.locations: Available across the Czech Republic, specific locations not listed on this page.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery via DPD (99 Kč) and Česká pošta - Balík do ruky (99 Kč). Parcel shop/locker delivery via Zásilkovna (59 Kč), Balíkovna (59 Kč), and Česká pošta - Balík na poštu (89 Kč). Free in-store pickup is also available.
PRICING: Shipping costs range from 59 Kč to 99 Kč. Free shipping is offered on all orders over 999 Kč. Cash on delivery (dobírka) has a surcharge of 29 Kč.
RESTRICTIONS: No information on delivery times, express or weekend delivery. No specific service for bulky items is mentioned.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Free shipping threshold of 999 Kč. Free in-store pickup. The company covers the cost of additional packages if an order needs to be split.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is consolidated on a single, easy-to-find page. The pricing is clear and simple. However, the page lacks crucial details like delivery timeframes and express/weekend options, which diminishes its completeness.
